item.title: From Maxim to Westin: A Look Back at the Casuarina Hotel and Casino Las Vegas History
item.description:
A New Kid on the Strip: The Maxim Era

Before it became the Westin, and before that, the Casuarina, the property we know today was the Maxim Hotel and Casino. Opened in 1990, the Maxim was a bold attempt to capture a younger, more hip clientele â€“ a move away from the traditional glitz and glamor of many Strip hotels. It was designed with a contemporary aesthetic and marketed aggressively, targeting a more casual visitor. While it never quite achieved the iconic status of its neighbors, it carved out a niche, especially during the early 90s.
